title: Women cabbies hit Nairobi's roads
text:
Women cabbies hit Nairobi's roads 5:31pm BST - 01:41
The number of women cab drivers in Nairobi is growing exponentially. As Fred Katayama reports, the popularity of ride-sharing platforms and the benefits they extend are attracting them. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The number of women cab drivers in Nairobi is growing exponentially. As Fred Katayama reports, the popularity of ride-sharing platforms and the benefits they extend are attracting them.
